title: want some people to play with
body:
my friends i normally play with i was in champ select with earlier but apparently one of them didnt like me playing brand, apparently i was trolling and so he dodged and they kicked me and now they wont let me play
eveyone else on my friends list just seems to not pay attention to my invites or doesnt want to play 
all i want is some nice people in silver to play with 
summoner name: support main 97

replies.body:
{{champion:22}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:245}} here. 
I'm also looking to learn more ways to play other heroes.
As long as you don't mind {{champion:133}} and Vowler, I'm in.
